TopicTitle: What time PST/PDT (Pacific time zone, west coast US) is KasperVld hosting the squadcast?

Articles.Content:
I know it'll be at a different time because well, both because he's in the Netherlands and he did it earlier than the usual time last week.

So, yeah, just wondering what time he'll be doing squadcast.

Well, it's PDT anyways and it's at 11am looks like.

Thanks.
Squadcast over, it seemed shorter this time. Only an hour.
